original_title: Sri Lanka Telecom, SriLankan Airlines bid deadlines extended
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – The deadline to submit expressions of interest for Sri Lanka Telecom and SriLankan Airlines have been extended on investor requests, Director General of the State Enterprises Restructuring Unit, Suresh Shah said.
The date to express interest for Sri Lanka Telecom was extended to January 12, 2024, from December 18.
The date for SriLankan Airlines was extended to January 09, 2024 from December 05.
The SRU will issue requests for proposal documents to qualified investors who express interest. (Colombo/Dec07/2023)
